question: You recently stayed with a childhood friend for a few days.Write a letter to this friend. In your letter:Thank your friend for letting you stay with them.refer to something enjoyable that you did while staying with him/herinvite your friend to visit you
text: Hi, I reached safely back home today morning. I am scripting, you this draft
to thank you to let me stay with you at your place on short notice for a couple of days .

The stay with you was a stress buster we did tonnes of crazy activities  in these couple of days which will be in  my remembrance on a good note, but would like to highlight one of the craziest things i have  done in my life .

Do you recollect on the way to your  native   we saw a Mango farm full of Mangoes  we  stopped and plunged the fence of the farm  and climbed on the tree  and plucked the Mangoes  while we were relishing   our booty the  farm owner came  running  in look for us with  a gun in his hand    and we started running   we barely managed to climb  back the wall and  get access to our car .
Lastly I encourage you to visit my Place in Uttarakhand  to do adventerous activites like Rafting  Para-sailing would await to hear from you
